quote.text: And Jesus went out, and departed from the temple: and his disciples came to him for to shew him the buildings of the temple.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And Jesus said unto them, See ye not all these things? verily I say unto you, There shall not be left here one stone upon another, that shall not be thrown down.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And as he sat upon the mount of Olives, the disciples came unto him privately, saying, Tell us, when shall these things be? and what shall be the sign of thy coming, and of the end of the world?
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And Jesus answered and said unto them, Take heed that no man deceive you.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: For many shall come in my name, saying, I am Christ; and shall deceive many.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And ye shall hear of wars and rumours of wars: see that ye be not troubled: for all these things must come to pass, but the end is not yet.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: For nation shall rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom: and there shall be famines, and pestilences, and earthquakes, in divers places.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: All these are the beginning of sorrows.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Then shall they deliver you up to be afflicted, and shall kill you: and ye shall be hated of all nations for my name's sake.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And then shall many be offended, and shall betray one another, and shall hate one another.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And many false prophets shall rise, and shall deceive many.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And because iniquity shall abound, the love of many shall wax cold.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: But he that shall endure unto the end, the same shall be saved.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And this gospel of the kingdom shall be preached in all the world for a witness unto all nations; and then shall the end come.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: When ye therefore shall see the abomination of desolation, spoken of by Daniel the prophet, stand in the holy place, (whoso readeth, let him understand:)
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Then let them which be in Judaea flee into the mountains:
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Let him which is on the housetop not come down to take any thing out of his house:
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Neither let him which is in the field return back to take his clothes.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And woe unto them that are with child, and to them that give suck in those days!
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: But pray ye that your flight be not in the winter, neither on the sabbath day:
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: For then shall be great tribulation, such as was not since the beginning of the world to this time, no, nor ever shall be.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And except those days should be shortened, there should no flesh be saved: but for the elect's sake those days shall be shortened.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Then if any man shall say unto you, Lo, here is Christ, or there; believe it not.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: For there shall arise false Christs, and false prophets, and shall shew great signs and wonders; insomuch that, if it were possible, they shall deceive the very elect.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Behold, I have told you before.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Wherefore if they shall say unto you, Behold, he is in the desert; go not forth: behold, he is in the secret chambers; believe it not.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east, and shineth even unto the west; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: For wheresoever the carcase is, there will the eagles be gathered together.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Immediately after the tribulation of those days shall the sun be darkened, and the moon shall not give her light, and the stars shall fall from heaven, and the powers of the heavens shall be shaken:
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And then shall appear the sign of the Son of man in heaven: and then shall all the tribes of the earth mourn, and they shall see the Son of man coming in the clouds of heaven with power and great glory.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And he shall send his angels with a great sound of a trumpet, and they shall gather together his elect from the four winds, from one end of heaven to the other.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Now learn a parable of the fig tree; When his branch is yet tender, and putteth forth leaves, ye know that summer is nigh:
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: So likewise ye, when ye shall see all these things, know that it is near, even at the doors.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Verily I say unto you, This generation shall not pass, till all these things be fulfilled.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Heaven and earth shall pass away, but my words shall not pass away.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: But of that day and hour knoweth no man, no, not the angels of heaven, but my Father only.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: But as the days of Noe were, so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: For as in the days that were before the flood they were eating and drinking, marrying and giving in marriage, until the day that Noe entered into the ark,
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And knew not until the flood came, and took them all away; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Then shall two be in the field; the one shall be taken, and the other left.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Two women shall be grinding at the mill; the one shall be taken, and the other left.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Watch therefore: for ye know not what hour your Lord doth come.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: But know this, that if the goodman of the house had known in what watch the thief would come, he would have watched, and would not have suffered his house to be broken up.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Therefore be ye also ready: for in such an hour as ye think not the Son of man cometh.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Who then is a faithful and wise servant, whom his lord hath made ruler over his household, to give them meat in due season?
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Blessed is that servant, whom his lord when he cometh shall find so doing.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: Verily I say unto you, That he shall make him ruler over all his goods.
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: But and if that evil servant shall say in his heart, My lord delayeth his coming;
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And shall begin to smite his fellowservants, and to eat and drink with the drunken;
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: The lord of that servant shall come in a day when he looketh not for him, and in an hour that he is not aware of,
quote.author: Matthew

quote.text: And shall cut him asunder, and appoint him his portion with the hypocrites: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth.
quote.author: Matthew
